author: nurfikri89
body:
Backport of #47987 

#### Original PR description:

This PR wraps up last minute fixes for JMENanoV15. The following changes are made: 
- Fix typo for the precision of `pt` and `mass` branches.
- Remove RobustParT for AK4 Puppi jets.
- Lower jet pT thresholds to store UParT nodes, fix precision of UParT branches

#### PR validation:

- Event size increase from 6.75 kb/event to 6.67 kb/event. Tested with 10k events from a `RunIII2024Summer24MiniAODV6` TTto4Q sample.
- passes the usual runTheMatrix test: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos`

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backported for JMENanoV15 production.
title: [JMENano] Backport of #47987 (Final fixes for JMENanoV15) to 15_0_X
